sentences.english: Suggested Applications—Orange and other citrus flavors.
sentences.chinese: 可用於甜橙和其他柑橘的香精。

sentences.english: Agriculture provides the economic base with major exports made up of copra and citrus fruit.
sentences.chinese: 農業以提供幹椰子肉和柑橘類的出口爲經濟基礎。

sentences.english: Citrus is one of the most important cultivating fruits in China.
sentences.chinese: 柑橘是我國的主栽果樹之一。

sentences.english: The worms were chubby and firm, with the springiness of clementine segments.
sentences.chinese: 蠕蟲豐滿結實，有克萊門氏小柑橘般的彈性。

sentences.english: You can buy fruit here — oranges and bananas, for example.
sentences.chinese: 您褦恠這裏買氺淉，笓侞買柑橘啝香蕉。

sentences.english: Peel the mandarin, remove pith and any seeds from each segment.
sentences.chinese: 柑橘剝皮，去除每一瓣的皮及籽。

sentences.english: Freezing damage is one of the majordisasters of the world citrus production.
sentences.chinese: 凍害是世界性的柑橘生產上的主要災害之一。

sentences.english: An off white to pale yellow free-flowing powder, with tangy citrus taste.
sentences.chinese: 米黃色自活動粉沫，帶有幽香撲鼻的柑橘滋味。

sentences.english: The tree is smaller than other orange trees, with slender twigs and lance-shaped leaves.
sentences.chinese: 橘樹株形小於其它柑橘類果樹，枝條細，葉呈矛狀。

sentences.english: The orange crop froze this winter.
In the mouth, it's smooth and citrus fruit driven with some nutty notes.
sentences.chinese: 在口中，她很圓滑，柑橘果主導並帶有果仁的風味。

sentences.english: Poached Asparagus, Potato Puree, Three Citrus Beurre Blanc.
sentences.chinese: 煮蘆筍，土豆泥，柑橘牛油沙司。

sentences.english: The citrus swallowtail, beautiful and animate, gave happiness to this family.
sentences.chinese: 美麗而富有生氣的柑橘鳳蝶，給這個家帶來了歡樂。

sentences.english: Beyond the orange grove lay-the green ribboned fields of a baronial estate.
sentences.chinese: 在柑橘林的那邊，展現着一片男爵莊園的帶狀田野。

sentences.english: But to define love is very different, for the same reason that words cannot fully describe the flavor of an orange.
sentences.chinese: 但要給愛下個定義卻很難，就像言語難盡柑橘之味。

sentences.english: The investigation resulted in a ban on all citrus pulp imports to the EU from Brazil.
sentences.chinese: 此項調查導致了歐盟禁止所有巴西柑橘果泥球的進口。

definition: blue or green jujube/Chinese green date
a variety of orange grown in Guangdong, Sichuan, Taiwan etc
